text: The ASUS ROG Zephyrus M GM501GM-WS74 15.6" Ultra Slim 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the battery life could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Elden Ring. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Zephyrus M GM501GM-WS74 15.6" Ultra Slim 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Valorant. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Zephyrus M GM501GM-WS74 15.6" Ultra Slim 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The ASUS ROG Zephyrus M GM501GM-WS74 15.6" Ultra Slim 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Starfield, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS ROG Zephyrus M GM501GM-WS74 15.6" Ultra Slim 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop. The speakers is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
